summary: Two men kidnap a girl off the streets, take her to a beach house owned by a drug-addicted stewardess, and hold her for ransom.
cast: Marlon Brando|Richard Boone|Rita Moreno|Pamela Franklin|Jess Hahn|Gérard Buhr|Jacques Marin|Hugues Wanner|Al Lettieri|Lucien Desagneaux|Albert Michel|Éric Rophé|Pierre Vaudier
title: La noche del día siguiente
